definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">iteration</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">particle dust 10 10 10 1 ~ ~ ~ 2.8 2.8 2.8 0 2400</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">FLASH</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">item.firecharge.use</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
